steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Select the table that you want to convert to text.
Go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Data' group, click on the 'Convert to Text' button.
A dialog box will appear. Choose the desired options for converting the table to text.
Click 'OK' to convert the table to text.
The selected table will now be converted to text in the document.
